questions.quote: So you keep it a secret your whole life, then at your funeral the mortician comes out  'Here, Mrs Costanza, I thought you might want this'.  Aahh!
Ohh, what are you gonna do? You gonna put on phony beards and dress-up like Arab sheiks and sit around in some hotel room. I mean come on...
He's a writer from Entertainment Weekly . I would like to have a good show.

Yes, but I still don't feel right about letting you into Kramer's apartment without his permission.
And now as Festivus rolls on, we come to the feats of strength.

Hey. You forgot about my piece of pie. Hello?  You know, sex in a tub. That doesn't work!
